North Devon is lighting up today with 5 ft @8s WSW swell and fresh 18 mph SSW winds. Porlock Weir and Lynmouth are your best bets, with good windows around mid and late morning. Tomorrow, conditions improve with 3 ft @10s WSW and light 7 mph SE winds, making for clean surf at spots like Woolacombe and Putsborough. Day after stays fun at 3 ft @8s W, with light winds, ideal for a chill surf session. Best: tomorrow.
